general_advisory: Farmers are advised to take proper care during irrigation as well as spraying operations due to the chance of light to moderate rainfall. Proper drainage system in fruit orchards and vegetable fields should be ensured. Regular monitoring against pests and diseases in crops is recommended. Avoid excess use of nitrogenous fertilizer to prevent insect pests and diseases.
